title: Engineering on Site Configuration PPDB Online
job_desc: Contributed to the configuration process to ensure the smooth functionality of the PPDB online system
Meticulously updated the data within the system, guaranteeing data accuracy and integrity
Conducted User Acceptance Testing (UAT), ensured the proper functioning of the system and verified the accuracy of user-displayed data

title: Computer and English Teacher
job_desc: Taught computer and English classes for elementary school students, utilizing innovative technique and integrating technology to enhance student engagement
Implemented interactive and enjoyable teaching methods, creating an environment supportive of learning and interest exploration
Assumed full responsibility for the management an upkeep of the computer lab, ensuring the availability to optimal resources for effective learning
